Diamond::
She opened her link to Zardus. "Misson completed. I'm on my way back."
She activated the cloaking device on the pod and gained altitude. She 
pushed the pod high into the atmosphere and glided up near the 
envelope.  She sat back and smiled at her work. "Ah yes, a job well 
done." Diamond, chuckled and grabbed a small container from the med 
kit under her seat.  She opened it up and spat into it.  It contained 
the fur and mechfluid from KitKat that her fangs had picked up while 
biting her. The mech fluid and fur contained her DNA. She was 
pleased. She was one who liked to keep something from her kills. Even 
if it was something small and unglamourous.  Even this, was something 
to remember this kill by. She put the container in her hip comparment 
and relaxed back in her chair.

She looked out the window as she noticed that she was allready half 
way back to the Allience base. 

::KitKat::'
She looked around the room.  Her eyes couldn't focus. Her vision was 
blurred and her neck was leaking where Diamond had bit her. She sat 
in the chair. "Drill....bit....he..help..please."
She closed her eyes and sat there. She had to try to hold on and warn 
the others. If Diamond was still in the base, they had to get her 
back for this.
